system.powerDescription:
An object up to {<CAT> size 0} size in short range can now take action to set up an ally, rolling 1d6, or PSYCHE if you are resonant with that object. The object can take or cause consequences as normal from these actions.
        
Allies have to be able to interact with it or use the object to gain its benefits. The object doesnâ€™t gain the ability to actually move or animate in any way, but fortune simply bends around it.
